endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of properties matching the specified filters.
Add a new property listing to the platform.
Fetch detailed information about a specific property.
Update the information of an existing property listing.
Remove a property listing from the platform.
Retrieve a list of user-saved search criteria.
Save a new search configuration for later use.
Delete a specific saved search configuration.
Retrieve a list of properties marked as featured or promoted.
Fetch properties recommended for the user based on their preferences.
